mapper.select: SELECT sch_no AS no, mem_id AS id, sch_name AS name, sch_startDate AS sdate, sch_endDate AS edate From schedule Where sch_isDeleted = 'N' AND mem_id = #{id}
mapper.update: Update Schedule Set sch_isDeleted='Y' Where sch_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: Insert INTO Schedule (sch_no,mem_id,sch_name,sch_startdate,sch_enddate) Values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(sch_no), 0) + 1 FROM schedule),#{id},#{name},#{sdate},#{edate})
